page.title: 16LIFE IN THE BUTTERLEIGH AREA
page.content: In a Questionnaire we asked the people of Butterleigh what they particularly liked about living in the area.This is what we found out: Most said that they enjoy the peace and quiet and the beautiful views and walks in the countryside around.They don't feel isolated-some said that they are in easy reach of the towns for shopping,others said that they were in easy reach of the moors and sea. They never have any trouble from vandals.Most people think that it is a friendly community. The neighbours are always willing to help each other especially old people.
